dc:title: Review of Large St. Andrew Daily Missal
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recommends a new edition of the St. Andrew Daily Missal saying it is a "veritable encyclopedia for the layman." Keywords: liturgy
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 656 1953-10-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
